name: SubWars
description:
Sub Wars is a local multiplayer game with a stealth basic mechanic.

Collect ammo and shoot your opponent before he does!

You can use your sonar to help locating yourself and showing ammo packs and your enemy!

Player 1 controls:

  • wasd to move
  • e to shoot
  • r to use sonar

Player 2 controls:

  • ijkl to move
  • o to shoot
  • p to use sonar
